description: A spinning area attack.

name: Punch
description: A basic melee attack.

name: Pound
description: A basic melee knockdown.

name: Overload
description: A spinning area attack.

name: Magnetic Leap
description: Pull yourself to your magnetically grasped foe and deliver a strike.

name: Drop Mine
description: Drop a mine that deals damage to enemies that trigger it.

name: Magnetic Bomb
description: Set a timed charge that pulls nearby foes.

name: Superspeed

facts.description: Movement speed is greatly increased. Maximum duration: 10s

description: Run at double speed.

name: Fire Shield

facts.description: Enveloped in a fiery shield that burns foes, grants might each time you are struck (1-second cooldown per attacker).
Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.
Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

description: Activate a fire shield that burns enemies who strike you, granting might for each burn applied.

name: Magnetic Aura

facts.description: Reflect projectiles with magnetic energy.

description: Become surrounded in a magnetic shield that reflects projectiles.

name: Glue Trail

facts.description: Unable to move; stacks duration.

description: Leave a trail of glue behind you that hampers enemy movement.

name: Dhuumfire
description: Blast your foe with life force, setting them alight.

name: Reaper's Mark

facts.description: Involuntary retreat; unable to act; stacks duration.

description: Mark. Inscribe a mark that inflicts fear on foes when triggered.

traited_facts.description: Cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared, or taunted.

name: Putrid Mark
description: Mark. Inscribe a mark that damages enemies and transfers your conditions to them when triggered.

name: Mark of Blood

facts.description: Gain health every second; stacks duration.
Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

description: Mark. Inscribe a mark that bleeds foes when they trigger it, and grants regeneration to allies.

traited_facts.description: Endurance regeneration increased by 50%; stacks duration.
Endurance regeneration increased by 50%; stacks duration.

name: Tainted Shackles

facts.description: Deals damage every second. Deals additional damage to foes that aren't moving. Stacks intensity.
You cannot stealth
Unable to move; stacks duration.

description: Shroud. Begin binding nearby enemies with your life force, pulsing out conditions; they can break this binding if they get far enough away from you. Bound foes are immobilized if the binding finishes.

name: Elixir X

facts.description: Transformed into a whirlpool.
Assumed the form of a moving plague.

description: Elixir. Drink Elixir X to become a rampaging brute, whirling tornado, or powerful lich. Underwater, become either a withering plague or a whirlpool.

traited_facts.description: Transformed into a whirlpool.
Assumed the form of a moving plague.
Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

name: Lacerating Slash

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

description: Beast. Slash your foes and cause them to bleed.

name: Shield Smash

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

description: Smash your foe with the magnetic shield.

name: Stone Sheath

facts.description: Gain barrier every second.
Gain barrier every second.
Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

description: Block the next attack and cause bleeding to foes around you. Gain Tectonic Shift if you successfully block an attack.

name: Arcane Brilliance
description: Arcane. Blast the area, hitting foes with critical damage and healing yourself. Healing effectiveness is increased per target hit. If this skill finishes a combo, you heal an additional amount.

traited_facts.description: Incoming strike damage decreased by 33%; stacks duration.

name: A.E.D.

facts.description: Heals when the timer expires. If lethal damage is taken, the damage is negated, you are healed for a large amount, and conditions are removed.
Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Damage received on skill activation; stacks intensity.
Deals damage every second; decreases healing effectiveness by 33%; damage stacks intensity.
Deals damage every second. Deals additional damage to foes that aren't moving. Stacks intensity.

description: Gadget. Activate your A.E.D., enabling the system to heal you after a brief period of time. If you take lethal damage while A.E.D. is active, it ends and heals you for a large amount and removes conditions.

name: Static Shock
description: Use your A.E.D. to stun an enemy.

traited_facts.description: Movement speed is greatly increased. Maximum duration: 10s
Movement speed is greatly increased. Maximum duration: 10s
Incoming strike damage decreased by 33%; stacks duration.
Incoming strike damage decreased by 33%; stacks duration.

name: Litany of Wrath

facts.description: Gain health based on damage dealt to enemies.

description: Meditation. Heal yourself. For a brief time, heal yourself based on a percentage of damage dealt to enemies.

name: Signet of the Ether
description:
Signet Passive: Heal yourself whenever you summon an illusion.
Signet Active: Heal yourself and reduce the recharge of phantasm skills.

Virtuoso: Passive triggers when stocking a blade.

name: Signet of Vampirism

facts.description: Life is siphoned when struck by players.

description:
Signet Passive: Steal health from nearby foes while in combat.
Signet Active: Heal yourself and mark a foe. Allied players will siphon life from the marked enemy.

name: Water Spirit

facts.description: Endurance regeneration increased by 50%; stacks duration.
Endurance regeneration increased by 50%; stacks duration.

description: Spirit. Summon a water spirit at a target location and heal yourself and your pet. The spirit will slam the ground and then shake, granting boons to nearby allies.
